  • Method Details

    • makeRequest

      private void makeRequest(String requestString) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Method makes request to access data. After response is received it will map required information the AssetQuote class instance fields.
      Parameters:
      requestString - address with information.
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if wrong data is entered.
      InterruptedException - thrown when a thread is interrupted while it's waiting, sleeping, or otherwise occupied.
